titles.title: A bill to provide for an additional place of holding court in the northern district of New York, and for other purposes.
A bill to provide for an additional place of holding court in the northern district of New York, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Amends the Federal judicial code to add Plattsburgh, New York, to the list of places for holding court in the Northern District of New York.
